channel.title: Great Job Renewable Power Team!
channel.description:
Continuing the discussion from [Renewable Power - SMR](https://forums.ficsit.app/t/renewable-power-smr/150):
Holy crap what an update 2.1 is. The Dyson Sphere stuff came out of the blue and blew me away. Now that it a goal for building my factory!
Fantastic Job , I know this is a bucket of work! Thanks to all of the team for making this a thing!

item.title: Great Job Renewable Power Team!
item.dc:creator: @deantendo Deantendo: 𝘛𝘩𝘦 𝘜𝘐 𝘎𝘶𝘺!
item.description:
@deantendo wrote:

the idea is that it’s a DEEP resource sink for late-game players. You need to keep feeding it to get the HUGE amounts of power out of it.

Think of the resources you pump into it as fuel.

Read full topic

item.title: Great Job Renewable Power Team!
item.dc:creator: @Yesod Yesod
item.description:
@Yesod wrote:

Interesting! How does the Dyson Sphere work tho? Do you launch satellites into space?

Read full topic
